task.title: Entering Receipts: Using the List View on the Receipt Object
task.abstract: Users can execute a batch using the list view on the Receipt object.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Receipts tab in the eBusiness application and click the Create New View link.

step.info: For example: Receipts Not Assigned to a Batch

step.cmd: Specify the filter criteria by selecting the All Receipts radio button.
Select Batch from the Field picklist, equals from the Operator picklist, and leave the Value field blank.
Add the Batch field to the Selected Fields column along with any other necessary fields to display.
Restrict visibility and click the Save button.
Select the applicable receipts and click the pencil icon to edit the Batch field.
Select the batch to assign to the receipt(s). Apply the change to the current record, or, to all selected records.

taskbody.result: Receipts are successfully entered into the batch.
